greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of (unlabeled) rooted trees with n leaf nodes and without unary nodes or outdegrees larger than k; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 1..141, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
example: :     o   N   o   o     o   N   o N N  :
:   o   N    N N N N  N N N    N N     :
maple: b:= proc(n, i, v, k) option remember; `if`(n=0,
A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n<2, n,
add(b(n, n+1-j, j, k), j=2..min(n, k)))
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n < 2, n, Sum[b[n, n + 1 - j, j, k], {j, 2, Min[n, k]}]];
Table[Table[A[n, 1 + d - n], {n, 1, d}], {d, 1, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 07 2017, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 08 2017
